# setValueForXAxis(_:yAxis:)

**Instance Method**

Sets the input values of a snapshot of a directional pad.

## Declaration

```swift
func setValueForXAxis(_ xAxis: Float, yAxis: Float)
```

## Parameters

- **xAxis**: A normalized value of the x-axis ranging from `-1` to `1`.
- **yAxis**: A normalized value for the y-axis ranging from `-1` to `1`.

## Discussion

This method does nothing if the associated controller isn’t a snapshot (its [doc://com.apple.gamecontroller/documentation/GameController/GCController/isSnapshot] property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false]`)`. Otherwise, this method sets the value of the direction pad’s buttons as well.
